system.weapons:
One of: Multi-laser (Front, Range 250m, Heavy, -/-/10, 3d10+3 E, Pen 4, Clip 100, Reload 3 Full).

Autocannon (Front, Range 300m, Heavy S/2/5, 4d10+5 I, Pen 4, Clip 60, Reload 2 Full),

Power Lifter (Front, Melee, 2d10+10, Pen 2, Unwieldy)
system.specialRules: Walkers ignore penalties for moving through difficult terrain. This Vehicle is open-topped, enemies may target the crew and passengers of the vehicle by using a Called Shot Action.
system.traitsText: Walkers ignore penalties for moving through difficult terrain. This Vehicle is open-topped, enemies may target the crew and passengers of the vehicle by using a Called Shot Action.
